messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Shogun Miniseries
messages.msgSnippet: Hi those that emailed me asked me to make a copy of the Shogun miniseries dont forget to send me your address so I can return the tapes to you. A few have
messages.messageBody:
Hi

those that emailed me asked me to make a copy of the
Shogun miniseries

dont forget to send me your address so I can return
the tapes to you.

A few have contacted me asking for them so i will do
them first come first served as your letter arrives to
me.

paul



--- "Scott <scottc_4@...>"
<scottc_4@...> wrote:

---------------------------------
Paul, I would like to buy a copy as long as it is the
miniseries, and
not the movie. Email me the details at
scottc_4@....
